description.zh-cn: 蜀汉昭烈皇帝刘备的皇后，后主刘禅的嫡母，吴懿之妹。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Zhaolie of Shu Han, Liu Bei. Stepmother of the second emperor Liu Shan, and sister of Wu Yi.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期蜀汉的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年益州牧刘焉之子，穆皇后的第一任丈夫。
description.en: Son of Liu Yan, Governor of Yi Province, during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He was the first husband of Empress Mu.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉将领，穆皇后之兄。
description.en: A general of Shu Han and the older brother of Empress Mu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的益州牧，刘瑁与刘璋之父。
description.en: Governor of Yi Province during the late Eastern Han dynasty, father of Liu Mao and Liu Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代地名，位于今河南省开封市附近。
description.en: An ancient Chinese commandery located near modern-day Kaifeng, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝时设立的刺史部，大致范围在今天的四川盆地。
description.en: A province established during the Han Dynasty, roughly corresponding to the modern Sichuan Basin.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，继承父亲刘焉担任益州牧，后投降刘备。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty who succeeded his father Liu Yan as Governor of Yi Province and later surrendered to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 孙权的妹妹，刘备的妻子之一。
description.en: Sister of Sun Quan and one of Liu Bei's wives.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期由孙权建立的政权。
description.en: A state founded by Sun Quan during the Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的谋士，在刘备夺取益州和汉中时发挥了重要作用。
description.en: An advisor to Liu Bei who played a crucial role in Liu Bei's conquest of Yi Province and Hanzhong.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉丞相，杰出的政治家和军事家。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han, an outstanding statesman and military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉的第二位也是最后一位皇帝，刘备之子。
description.en: The second and last emperor of Shu Han, son of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉官员，因怀疑其妻与后主刘禅有染而被处死。
description.en: An official of Shu Han who was executed after suspecting his wife of having an affair with the emperor Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉官员刘琰的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Shu Han official Liu Yan.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国成都市，是纪念蜀汉丞相诸葛亮的祠堂，刘备的陵寝惠陵也位于此。
description.en: Located in Chengdu, China, it is a shrine dedicated to Zhuge Liang, the chancellor of Shu Han. The tomb of Liu Bei, Huiling, is also located here.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期由刘备建立的政权，以延续汉朝为名。
description.en: A state during the Three Kingdoms period of China, founded by Liu Bei with the claim of succeeding the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉后主刘禅的第一位皇后，张飞之女。穆皇后的皇后位号继任者。
description.en: The first empress of Liu Shan, the second emperor of Shu Han, and a daughter of Zhang Fei. She succeeded Empress Mu as the reigning empress.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的妻子之一。
description.en: One of Liu Bei's wives.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的妾室，后主刘禅的生母，被追谥为昭烈皇后。
description.en: A concubine of Liu Bei and the birth mother of Liu Shan. She was posthumously honored as Empress Zhaolie.

description.zh-cn: 穆皇后初嫁于刘焉之子刘瑁，刘瑁死后成为寡妇。
description.en: Empress Mu was first married to Liu Mao, son of Liu Yan. She became a widow after Liu Mao's death.

description.zh-cn: 建安十九年（214年），刘备平定益州后，纳穆皇后（当时为吴氏）为夫人。
description.en: In 214, after conquering Yi Province, Liu Bei took Empress Mu (then Lady Wu) as his wife.

description.zh-cn: 穆皇后是吴懿之妹。
description.en: Empress Mu was the younger sister of Wu Yi.

description.zh-cn: 刘焉因听相士说吴氏（后来的穆皇后）有贵人之相，于是将她嫁给自己的儿子刘瑁。
description.en: After hearing a physiognomist say that Lady Wu (the future Empress Mu) had the appearance of a noble person, Liu Yan married her to his son Liu Mao.

description.zh-cn: 刘瑁是刘焉之子。
description.en: Liu Mao was the son of Liu Yan.

description.zh-cn: 刘璋是刘焉之子。
description.en: Liu Zhang was the son of Liu Yan.

description.zh-cn: 刘瑁与刘璋是兄弟关系。
description.en: Liu Mao and Liu Zhang were brothers.

description.zh-cn: 刘备于建安十九年（214年）从刘璋手中夺取益州。
description.en: In 214, Liu Bei seized Yi Province from Liu Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 法正是刘备的谋士。
description.en: Fa Zheng was an advisor to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 法正劝说刘备娶当时守寡的吴氏（后来的穆皇后）为夫人。
description.en: Fa Zheng persuaded Liu Bei to marry the widowed Lady Wu (the future Empress Mu).

description.zh-cn: 章武元年（221年）五月，刘备称帝后，由时任丞相的诸葛亮持节授予吴夫人皇后玺绶。
description.en: In the fifth month of 221, after Liu Bei declared himself emperor, Chancellor Zhuge Liang was sent as an envoy to present the empress's seal and tassel to Lady Wu.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅是刘备的儿子和继承人。
description.en: Liu Shan was the son and heir of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 建兴元年（223年）五月，后主刘禅即位，尊吴皇后为皇太后。
description.en: In the fifth month of 223, after ascending the throne, Emperor Liu Shan honored Empress Wu as Empress Dowager.

description.zh-cn: 建兴十二年（234年），吴太后（穆皇后）曾将在新年朝贺的刘琰之妻胡氏留在宫中数月。
description.en: In 234, Empress Dowager Wu (Empress Mu) had Lady Hu, wife of Liu Yan, stay in the palace for several months after she came to offer New Year greetings.

description.zh-cn: 胡氏是刘琰的妻子。
description.en: Lady Hu was the wife of Liu Yan.

description.zh-cn: 刘琰怀疑其妻胡氏与后主刘禅有染，令士卒掌掴她。
description.en: Suspecting his wife Lady Hu of having an affair with Emperor Liu Shan, Liu Yan ordered his soldiers to slap her face.

description.zh-cn: 胡氏被丈夫殴打后，怒而告发，导致刘琰被处死。
description.en: After being beaten by her husband, Lady Hu angrily reported him, which led to Liu Yan's execution.

description.zh-cn: 穆皇后是陈留人。
description.en: Empress Mu was a native of Chenliu.

description.zh-cn: 穆皇后于221年被立为蜀汉皇后，223年被尊为皇太后，直至245年去世。
description.en: Empress Mu was installed as Empress of Shu Han in 221 and honored as Empress Dowager in 223, a title she held until her death in 245.

description.zh-cn: 刘备于221年建立蜀汉政权。
description.en: Liu Bei founded the state of Shu Han in 221.

description.zh-cn: 穆皇后于延熙八年（245年）去世，与刘备合葬于惠陵（位于今成都武侯祠内）。
description.en: Empress Mu passed away in 245 and was buried with Liu Bei in the Huiling Mausoleum (located within the present-day Wuhou Shrine in Chengdu).

description.zh-cn: 孙夫人是刘备的妻子之一。
description.en: Lady Sun was one of Liu Bei's wives.

description.zh-cn: 糜夫人是刘备的妻子之一。
description.en: Lady Mi was one of Liu Bei's wives.

description.zh-cn: 甘夫人（昭烈皇后）是刘备的侧室。
description.en: Lady Gan (Empress Zhaolie) was a concubine of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅的生母是甘夫人（昭烈皇后）。
description.en: Liu Shan's birth mother was Lady Gan (Empress Zhaolie).

description.zh-cn: 敬哀皇后是后主刘禅的第一位皇后。
description.en: Empress Jing'ai was the first empress of the second emperor Liu Shan.
